bug.author: rizar
bug.summary: Documentation of Session arguments seems outdated
bug.description: In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/public/README.md>README.md</denchmark-link> a session is created as . At the same time, the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/client/session.py#L888>docstring</denchmark-link> says "no value other than an empty string is supported". This is clearly an inconsistency.

comments.comment: The documentation is incorrect. You should probably be using tf.Session() most of the time. so we will updates the tf.Session() docstring as well ad the README.md. See here for another example <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/how_tos/distributed/index.html>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/how_tos/distributed/index.html</denchmark-link> .
